com.github.robocup_atan.atan.model

Class SServerCoach

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.github.robocup_atan.atan.model.AbstractUDPClient
        • com.github.robocup_atan.atan.model.SServerCoach
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionsCoach, Runnable

    public class SServerCoach
extends AbstractUDPClient
implements ActionsCoach
    A simple implementation of AbstractUDPClient for Coaches.
    Author:
    Atan

      • eye

        public void eye(boolean eyeOn)
        Turns on or off the sending of "(see_global ...)" information from the server.
        Specified by:
        eye in interface ActionsCoach
        Parameters:
        eyeOn - True to turn see_global on, false to turn it off.

      • look

        public void look()
        This command provides information about the positions of the following objects on the field. The left and right goals? (Do they move?) The ball. All active players. This is the same data as from see_global, but it is only received when look in invoked.
        Specified by:
        look in interface ActionsCoach

      • getTeamNames

        public void getTeamNames()
        This command provides information about the names of both teams and which side they are playing on.
        Specified by:
        getTeamNames in interface ActionsCoach

      • changePlayerType

        public void changePlayerType(int unum,
                    int playerType)
        This command changes a specified players type. Each time a player is substituted by some other player type, its stamina, recovery and effort is reset to the initial (maximum) value of the respective player type.
        Specified by:
        changePlayerType in interface ActionsCoach
        Parameters:
        unum - The players uniform number (1~11 on pitch usually, subs <= 14).
        playerType - A player type between 0 (the standard player) and 18. However, player.conf can change this.

      • say

        public void say(String message)
        This command broadcasts the message throughout the field. Any player near enough (specified with audio_cut_dist default 50.0 meters), with enough hearing capacity will hear the message.
        Specified by:
        say in interface ActionsCoach
        Parameters:
        message - A valid String to say.

      • teamGraphic

        public void teamGraphic(XPMImage xpm)
        This command sends a team graphic to the SServer.
        Specified by:
        teamGraphic in interface ActionsCoach
        Parameters:
        xpm - An XPMImage to use.

      • bye

        public void bye()
        This is used to disconnect a coach from the server. The server will not respond.
        Specified by:
        bye in interface ActionsCoach
